idea:
We would like to introduce Aver Solutions & Global Services Pvt. Ltd. having registered office in Mumbai.

We bring to the Customers:

•    Telecommunication Solutions including Security & Surveillance involving CCTV, Access Control, Public Address and General Alarm System, Perimeter Intrusion Detection System, Telephone, wireless technologies for communications, Fibre Optic solutions, Radio systems – complete Integrated Solutions in Telecommunications, knitted with common dashboards.
•    Command Control Centres with a view to promote latest technologies for Dash Boards, State of the art Interiors including Ergonomic Design and 3D modelling studies, Energy optimization, Human Factor Engineering (HFE), use of latest material to cut emission, State of the art Control room Consoles etc.
•    Process Control Solutions & Instrumentation with ESD, Fire & Gas, PLCs, Variable Speed Drives, Skids, Instrumentation on wireless technologies thus ensuring faster implementation and reducing Kms of cables, trenches etc.
•    SCADA, RTUs and leak detection solutions over wide area network (WAN), making it easier to access from anywhere.
name: AVER SOLUTIONS AND GLOBAL SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
In today’s day and age of technology when everything from A to Z (literally Amazon’s logo) can be delivered to your home, to the convenience of your doorstep through the simple ease of sitting on your couch, pulling out your smart phone and pressing a few buttons, the question which dawned upon was – Why can’t we get fuel delivered to our doorstep, just like books?
Fuel Start-ups viz-a-viz Retail Petrol Pumps:

Retail petrol pumps caters to majority of the fuel needs in the country but starting a retail petrol pump is no small task. A retail petrol pump business not just demands heavy investments upfront but the day to day operational operational costs are also very high. This contracts the profit margins in the business and thus results in long break even time in the business. The manpower cost every single month is also high. Acquisition of land for a retail petrol pump is a tedious task and upon starting of such an outlet, the prime lands are also locked for a long long tenures of time. Comparatively, all that a fuel startup has to do to start a fuel reselling business is to own a PESO approved mobile petrol pump and register the startup as a company and it is all set to start such a business. The cost incurred in doorstep diesel delivery business with a startup are minimal when compared to a retail petrol pump and also the daily operational costs are minuscule. All this lends to Fuel Start Ups becoming a great option for an aspiring fuel entrepreneur.
Doorstep Delivery of Fuel. With all the technological advancements we can deliver all the energies at the doorsteps through  a Mobile Fuel Station.

This Mobile Petrol Pump/Fuel station is equipped with all the latest technology like the internet of things which helps a controller talk to the vehicle and measure every drop of diesel that is dispensed through the nozzle and reflect the same on an app!
name: JAI BHAWANI PETROLEUM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Xapsol Xtramile People Solution Private Limited (XXPSPL) offers it's services is into the Organizational Development Domain. We provide 360 degree Training, E-Learning & Organizational Development Solutions to our clients across various sectors.

Our niche services are

1. A pathbreaking Program Management System - Highly customizable as per the needs of the organization and our flagship product.

2. Assessment and Development Centers (Physical and Digital) - Our group of assessors were trained by Indian Army personals.

3. Instructor Led Workshops (both physical and digital)

4. Theatre, Drama & Active Meditation based workshops (both physical and digital)

5. Content Development

6. e-Learning content and LMS

7. Hiring Consultancy
name: XAPSOL XTRAMILE PEOPLE SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED
